text: Elżbieta Justyna Czyżewska (May 14, 1938Some sources such as Find a Grave and The New York Times cite April 14, 1938 - June 17, 2010) was a Polish actress. She was active in both Poland and the United States. She was known for her role in The Saragossa Manuscript (1964). She died on June 17, 2010 in Manhattan, New York City at the age of 72 from esophageal cancer.New York Times obituary ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official website * Polish film database * Elżbieta Czyżewska biodata * Elżbieta Czyżewska at Culture.pl Category:1938 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Entertainers from Warsaw Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors
title: Elżbieta Czyżewska
